bill.title: Alternative energy transmission; create incentives for technology.
bill.description: An Act To Encourage The Utilization Of Smart Grid Systems By Electric Utilities Regulated By The Public Service Commission; To Require The Mississippi Development Authority To Develop A Plan To Promote More Efficient Use Of Electrical Transmission And Distribution Systems; To Require Goals Related To The Plan; To Require That The Plan Shall Be Provided To The Speaker Of The House And The Lieutenant Governor; To Amend Sections 27-65-107 And 27-67-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt Smart Grid And Smart Metering Technology Purchases From Sales And Use Taxes; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Utilities;Ways and Means
